name: Black White
description:
A puzzle game running inside the Windows console using ASCII art.

The goal of the game is to take your character (@) to the exit (X). You can push (#) and (%) tiles similar to Push The Box puzzle game.

Your character has two colors, black and white. When black your character can walk only on (·) tiles, and when white it can walk on (+) tiles.

When your character is black, (%) tiles can be traversed as paths and when it's white, (#) tiles become paths.

P.S. DID YOU 5EE THE CAKE?
